title: Real-Time Health Monitoring Access
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to access real-time health metrics from my patients so that I can efficiently monitor their health status and ensure timely intervention when needed.

title: Video Communication for Remote Health Monitoring
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to initiate and receive video calls with my patients through ALFRED so that I can enhance communication regarding their health and well-being.

title: Medication Reminder System
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to set and adjust medication reminders for my patients so that they receive timely notifications for their medications, ensuring adherence to their care plans.

title: User-Friendly Interface for Caregivers
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want an intuitive interface to quickly access critical health information and perform necessary actions so that I can efficiently monitor my patients' health and maintain communication with them.

title: Privacy Settings Management
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want older adults to easily manage their privacy settings so that I can access only the health data they consent to share, ensuring their privacy and trust.

title: Incident Alert System
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want ALFRED to notify me of significant health incidents or anomalies detected in my patients' health data so that I can ensure timely intervention and provide effective care.
